name: Sub String
description:
NOTE: If you get softlocked, press R to reset the level.

ever since the hedron collapsed, i've heard the sound
in the distance, someone is pinging
it's heartwarming to know that people are out there somewhere
that feeling is what taught me to play
~ the wanderer

Made for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost and Found

  • Matthew Zhang (@1f1n1ty_): Design, Art, Sound, Writing
  • Stardew: Testing
  • Sleepless: Testing
  • Oncill: Vocal chords
  • Pernelle: Unused vocal chords
  • Team Roasted Toasted: Giving me a place to stay
  • Johnfn and Co: Inspiration
  • You: The star of the show
